functions.tag: {CustomModelData:128,CustomAttributes:1b,display:{Name:'{"translate":"コーンスープの鍋","color":"yellow","italic":false,"bold":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"心が温まるスープが特盛に入った鍋","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','{"translate":"飲むとHPがじわじわと回復する","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','{"translate":"熱いので少量ずつしか飲めない","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" コーンスープ"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"コーンスープ",Level:1,Interval:160,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:40},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.1d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
